products.name: Adidas Yeezy Boost 350 V2
products.description: The iconic Yeezy Boost 350 V2 shoes by Kanye West, featuring a comfortable fit and unique colorways.

products.name: Adidas Gazelle
products.description: A timeless classic, the Adidas Gazelle features a suede upper and clean lines for versatile styling.

products.name: Adidas Predator 20.3
products.description: Engineered for precision and control, the Predator 20.3 football boots offer superior grip and comfort on the field.

products.name: Adidas Stan Smith
products.description: The iconic Stan Smith sneakers, known for their minimalist design and all-white aesthetic.

products.name: Adidas Samba OG
products.description: The Adidas Samba OG combines classic design with modern comfort, perfect for both indoor and outdoor wear.

products.name: Adidas SolarBoost
products.description: Optimized for energy return, the Adidas SolarBoost provides enhanced cushioning for long-distance runs.

products.name: Adidas Harden Vol. 5
products.description: Designed in collaboration with James Harden, these basketball shoes offer exceptional support and traction.

products.name: Adidas AlphaEdge 4D
products.description: Featuring 4D printed midsoles, the AlphaEdge 4D provides unmatched energy return and stability for runners.

products.name: Adidas ZX 2K Boost
products.description: A modern take on the classic ZX line, featuring Boost cushioning and futuristic design elements.

products.name: Adidas Tiro 21
products.description: The Adidas Tiro 21 training pants offer comfort and style for both on and off the field.

products.name: Adidas Samba ADV
products.description: An advanced version of the classic Samba, featuring enhanced comfort and durability for everyday wear.

products.name: Adidas Continental 80
products.description: The Adidas Continental 80 delivers a vintage look with modern comfort, perfect for everyday wear.

products.name: Adidas Adizero Adios Pro
products.description: Designed for elite marathon runners, the Adizero Adios Pro offers lightweight performance and exceptional energy return.

products.name: Adidas Pulseboost HD
products.description: The Pulseboost HD combines stylish design with responsive Boost cushioning for both athletic and casual wear.

products.name: Adidas Z.N.E.2
products.description: The Adidas Z.N.E.2 offers a blend of classic and modern styles, featuring Boost cushioning for all-day comfort.

products.name: Adidas Nizza Run
products.description: The Adidas Nizza Run combines retro aesthetics with contemporary comfort, ideal for daily wear.

products.name: Adidas Equinox Running Tights
products.description: Stay warm and stylish with Adidas Equinox Running Tights, featuring moisture-wicking fabric and a comfortable fit.

products.name: Adidas Adilette Slides
products.description: The Adidas Adilette Slides offer effortless style and comfort, perfect for casual outings and post-workout relaxation.

products.name: Adidas Axeler 3D Shoes
products.description: The Adidas Axeler 3D Shoes provide enhanced flexibility and support, making them ideal for dynamic movements and active lifestyles.

products.name: Adidas Originals T7
products.description: Adidas Originals T7 combines classic design with modern comfort, perfect for versatile everyday wear.

products.name: Adidas Ultraboost DNA
products.description: Experience the ultimate in running technology with the Adidas Ultraboost DNA, featuring Primeknit uppers and Boost cushioning.

products.description: The Adidas Ultraboost 21 shoes feature a breathable knit upper and responsive Boost cushioning for a comfortable run.
